text: Daniele da Castrovillari (Cosenza, 1613 - Venice, 29 November 1678) was an Italian composer.Castrovillari, Daniele da : Oxford Music Online https://oxfordindex.oup.com/view/10.1093/gmo/9781561592630.article.05152 "He was active as an organist in Venice, however, and is probably the 'Fra Daniele' who played the principal organ at S Antonio in Padua in 1674. Three operas ..." His opera La Cleopatra was recreated by Ars Minerva in San Francisco in 2015. ==References== Category:1613 births Category:1678 deaths
title: Daniele da Castrovillari
